about_the_game:
Various weapons!!

-RED DAWN has a variety of weapons, from small weapons such as pistols and machine pistols to heavy machine guns and anti-material sniper rifles!
However, each weapon has its own advantages and disadvantages, so it is best to prepare the appropriate weapon depending on the situation.




Many Wearable items!!

-Get clothes, accessories, and hat items and customize your character!
Hundreds of items are available, including school uniforms, Chipao, glasses, and more!


Easy to learn tactics

-Detour and attack to neutralize enemy cover
-Expose the enemy by destroying the cover to make it easier to hit the enemy.



Story


-Carimae Private School and Tiesov Public School have long been famous for their bad relationship...
In September 1980, Tiesov invaded Carimae with an armored division.

The story moves to the present, 1984.

Years have passed since Carimae and Tiesov began their war, but the front lines remain stalemate.
However, Carimae School's intelligence agency receives intelligence that Tiesov is creating a "secret weapon" to overturn the deadlocked front line.

You must take command of the Baker Squad at Carimae Private School and stop the creation of a "secret weapon".

Various weapons!!

-RED DAWN has a variety of weapons, from small weapons such as pistols and machine pistols to heavy machine guns and anti-material sniper rifles!
However, each weapon has its own advantages and disadvantages, so it is best to prepare the appropriate weapon depending on the situation.

Hundreds of items are available, including school uniforms, Chipao, glasses, and more!

-Detour and attack to neutralize enemy cover
-Expose the enemy by destroying the cover to make it easier to hit the enemy.



Story


-Carimae Private School and Tiesov Public School have long been famous for their bad relationship...
In September 1980, Tiesov invaded Carimae with an armored division.

The story moves to the present, 1984.

Years have passed since Carimae and Tiesov began their war, but the front lines remain stalemate.

name: RED DAWN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 4090
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: no

short_description: RED DAWN is an SRPG game with cute graphics! Take command of Baker squad and fight back against Tiesov's invasion! The Winning or Losing of Carimae School is depends to you.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese
